languages.text: "Попрошу Вашу Светлость следить за языком, когда вы отзываетесь о Ее Светлости Теодоре. Не знаю, как в вашей реальности, а в нашей принято помнить о манерах".
"I would ask your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to watch your language as you speak of Her Ladyship Theodora. I do not know how it is in your reality, but in ours, it is customary to mind one's manners."
languages.original_text: "Попрошу Вашу Светлость следить за языком, когда вы отзываетесь о Ее Светлости Теодоре. Не знаю, как в вашей реальности, а в нашей принято помнить о манерах".

traits.locale_text: "I would ask your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to watch your language when you speak of Her Ladyship Theodora. I do not know how it is in your reality, but in ours it is customary to mind one's manners."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would ask your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to watch your language when you speak of Her Ladyship Theodora. I do not know how it is in your reality, but in ours it is customary to mind one's manners."

traits.locale_text: "I would ask your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to watch your language as you speak of Her Ladyship Theodora. I do not know how it is in your reality, but in ours, it is customary to mind one's manners."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would ask your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to watch your language as you speak of Her Ladyship Theodora. I do not know how it is in your reality, but in ours, it is customary to mind one's manners."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Je vous prie de surveiller votre langage lorsque vous parlez de Sa seigneurie Théodora. Je ne connais pas les coutumes de votre réalité, mais dans la nôtre, les gens respectent les bonnes manières. »
languages.original_text: "I would ask your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to watch your language as you speak of Her Ladyship Theodora. I do not know how it is in your reality, but in ours, it is customary to mind one's manners."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous prie de surveiller votre langage lorsque vous parlez de Sa seigneurie Théodora. Je ne connais pas les coutumes de votre réalité, mais dans la nôtre, les gens respectent les bonnes manières. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, le pediría que modere su lenguaje al hablar de lady Theodora. No sé cómo hacen las cosas en su realidad, pero en esta lo normal es mostrarse cortés».
languages.original_text: "I would ask your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to watch your language as you speak of Her Ladyship Theodora. I do not know how it is in your reality, but in ours, it is customary to mind one's manners."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, le pediría que modere su lenguaje al hablar de lady Theodora. No sé cómo hacen las cosas en su realidad, pero en esta lo normal es mostrarse cortés».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我请求您提及西奥多拉夫人时，注意一下自己的用词。我不知道您的世界是什么样的规矩，但在我们的世界中，注意自己的举止是惯例行为。”
languages.original_text: "I would ask your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to watch your language as you speak of Her Ladyship Theodora. I do not know how it is in your reality, but in ours, it is customary to mind one's manners."

traits.locale_text: “我请求您提及西奥多拉夫人时，注意一下自己的用词。我不知道您的世界是什么样的规矩，但在我们的世界中，注意自己的举止是惯例行为。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「シオドーラ様について話される時は、言葉遣いには気をつけていただきたいものです。あなた方の現実ではどうかは知りませんが、我々の場では、マナーに気をつけるのが当然の習慣なのですよ」
languages.original_text: "I would ask your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to watch your language as you speak of Her Ladyship Theodora. I do not know how it is in your reality, but in ours, it is customary to mind one's manners."

traits.locale_text: 「シオドーラ様について話される時は、言葉遣いには気をつけていただきたいものです。あなた方の現実ではどうかは知りませんが、我々の場では、マナーに気をつけるのが当然の習慣なのですよ」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich möchte Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} bitten, auf Eure Sprache zu achten, wenn Ihr von ihrer Ladyschaft Theodora sprecht. Ich weiß nicht, wie es in Eurer Realität ist, doch in unserer ist es üblich, auf seine Manieren zu achten."
languages.original_text: "I would ask your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to watch your language as you speak of Her Ladyship Theodora. I do not know how it is in your reality, but in ours, it is customary to mind one's manners."

traits.locale_text: "Ich möchte Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} bitten, auf Eure Sprache zu achten, wenn Ihr von ihrer Ladyschaft Theodora sprecht. Ich weiß nicht, wie es in Eurer Realität ist, doch in unserer ist es üblich, auf seine Manieren zu achten."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin Leydi Hazretleri Theodora'dan bahsederken sözlerine dikkat etmesini tavsiye ederim. Sizin gerçekliğinizde nasıldı bilmiyorum ama bizim gerçekliğimizde terbiyeli olmak gelenektir."
languages.original_text: "I would ask your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to watch your language as you speak of Her Ladyship Theodora. I do not know how it is in your reality, but in ours, it is customary to mind one's manners."
